Ishank Agrawal

Hey there! I'm Ishank and welcome to my site. I'm a sophomore at MIT (class of 26') majoring in computer science (6-3). In high school, I participated in math and physics olympiads in high school. Currently I am interested in machine learning, specifically its intersection with systems and performance engineering. In my free time, I love to dance, run, play basketball and poker.

Research

Imposing Uniformity using Poisson Flow
Can enforcing uniformity on well-aligned features improve their downstream performance on classification tasks?
Links: Blogpost
Reformers: Hybrid Attention-Retention Networks for Faster Inference
Mixing attention and retention heads for faster inference while maintaining perplexity.
Links: Paper, Poster
H-Scores for Communication Channel Inference
Using H-scores for better inference in communication channels

Fast Neural Style Transfer
Using neural compression techniques including quantization and pruning for faster neural style transfer
